text: geunal-e modeun ineun geuga silcheonhan seonhaeng-i jasin ap-e noh-yeo iss-eum-eul balgyeonhal geos-imyeo geuga jeojileun aghaengdo geuleohal geos-ini geugeos(aghaeng)gwa jasin saie meonameon geoliga issgileul galmanghal geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-ege geubun jasin-eul gyeong-gohasinola. hananimkkeseoneun jongbogdeul-ege injahasin bun-ila
